QuestData.Title: Shadow of the Triumvirate
QuestData.Description: Talgath's words carry more gravity than I think he knew. In an attempt to hurt me one final time, he has given us the answer.$b$bThe Crest of Knowledge is hidden away in the Seat of the Triumvirate, and it is not unguarded.$b$bIf my suspicions are correct, we may be facing a greater threat than any of us dared imagine.$b$bA dark naaru.$b$bLet us return to the Vindicaar. We will plan our next steps there.
QuestData.RewardText: I worried for L'ura, but this is... unthinkable.$b$bHow she must have suffered...
